definition: to catch cold/(common) cold/CL:場|场[chang2],次[ci4]/(coll.) to be interested in (often used in the negative)/(Tw) to detest/can't stand
to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~
to emit/to give off/to send out (or up, forth)/to brave/to face/reckless/to falsely adopt (sb's identity etc)/to feign/(literary) to cover

sentences.english: His nose is stopped up with a cold.
I need some medicine for my cold.
sentences.chinese: 我想买点儿治感冒的药。

sentences.english: I catch a cold these days, do not know what to patulin buy is gift nice?
sentences.chinese: 我这几天感冒，不知买什么感冒药才好？

sentences.english: I catch a cold these days, do not know what to patulin buy is gift nice?
sentences.chinese: 我这几天感冒，不知买什么感冒药才好？

sentences.english: He is down with a nasty bout of flu.
sentences.chinese: 他患了一阵子感冒，很难受。

sentences.english: A cold predisposes a person to pneumonia.
sentences.chinese: 感冒易使患者感染肺炎。

sentences.english: When the world sneezes, it's the global economy that catches the nastiest cold.
sentences.chinese: 世界一打喷嚏，全球经济就感冒。

sentences.english: Oh, I catch a cold and decide to go to drug store.
sentences.chinese: 哦，我有点感冒，去药店买药。

sentences.english: There is no sovereign remedy for colds.
sentences.chinese: 伤风感冒没有灵丹妙药。

sentences.english: PHILADELPHIA (AP) -- Unwanted by the NBA, Allen Iverson is considering playing in China.
sentences.chinese: NBA无人感冒的艾弗森正考虑来中国打球。

sentences.english: Figure 12. Raynaud disease in a 39-year-old man with cold-induced vasospasm.
sentences.chinese: 雷诺氏病，39岁，男，感冒引起的血管痉挛。

sentences.english: Put on a jacket before you go out, or you'll ( ).
sentences.chinese: 出去时穿上件马夹，否则你会感冒的。

sentences.english: He oversleeps because of having a slight cold.
sentences.chinese: 他因为轻微感冒而睡过了头。

sentences.english: How to enhance the ability to countermine cold?
sentences.chinese: 如何增强抵抗感冒的能力呢？

sentences.english: Otitis media is usually caused by the common cold.
sentences.chinese: 中耳炎是通常所造成的普通感冒。

sentences.english: He sniffled, and I knew he caught cold.
sentences.chinese: 他吸着鼻子说话，我才知道他感冒了。

pinyin: shang4 hu1 xi1 dao4 gan3 ran3

definition: to have a high temperature (from illness)/to have a fever
bacterial tracheitis (inflammation of the windpipe, often caused by Staphylococcus aureus)/henpecked (a pun on 妻子管得严 used in comic theater)
